content: * 6 7 8 more times slip next stitch dropping second wrap off the needle k2 k all sole stitches 6 k2 *sl1 k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times sl1 k2 k all sole stitches 7 repeat round 6 8 k2 *k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through k2 k all sole stitches repeat rounds 5-8 until sock measures approx 2 5 inches shorter than desired finished length ending after round 5 mini -gusset 9 k2 *sl1 k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times sl1 k2 on sole needle k1 m1r k to 1 st before end of needle m1l k1 10 k2 *sl1 k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times sl1 k2 k all sole stitches 11 k2 *k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through k2 on sole needle k1 m1r k to 1 st before copyright 2011 by dena stelly www littlemonkeysstitchnspin com end of needle m1l k1 12 k2 *slip next stitch dropping second wrap off the needle k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times slip next stitch dropping second wrap off the needle k2 k all sole stitches 13 repeat round 9 14 k2 *sl1 k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times sl1 stop do not work last two stitches or sole stitches move two stitches from both sides of the sock down to the sole needle 28 32 36 instep stitches 38 42 46 sole stitches garter stitch short row heel worked on sole needle only 15 rs k37 41 45 wrap last stitch tightly 16 ws k36 40 44 wrap next st tightly and turn work 17 k to one stitch before next wrapped st wrap next st and turn work repeat row 17 until 8 8 10 stitches are worked between wrapped stitches ending with a ws row there should be an equal number of wrapped stitches on both sides of the sole needle 18 k9 9 11 you will work one wrapped stitch leaving the first wrap around the base of the stitch wrap next st and turn work 19 k10 10 12 working one wrapped stitch leaving the first wrap around the base of the stitch wrap next st and turn work continue in this manner working one more center stitch on each subsequent round until the last heel stitch has received it s second wrap ending after a ws row turn and begin working in rounds 20 k to end of sole needle stop bor is now the first stitch on the instep needle ankle 21 k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through k4 repeat 6 7 8 times more k1 wrapping needle twice before pulling through on 2nd needle k4 k1 wrapping
